mapper.sql: ID, USERNAME, USERNUM, USERAGE, USERLABEL, CREATEDATE, PERSONLABEL_ID
mapper.update:
update
set ID = #{ID}, USERNAME = #{USERNAME}, USERNUM = #{USERNUM}, USERAGE = #{USERAGE}, USERLABEL = #{USERLABEL}, CREATEDATE = #{CREATEDATE}, PERSONLABEL_ID = PERSONLABEL_ID where PERSONLABEL_ID = #{PERSONLABEL_ID}
